questions.question_text: Which of the following file types are supported for the DocumentPath property in the Classify Document Scope activity?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
NOTE: The supported file types for this property field are .png, .gif, .jpe, .jpg, .jpeg, .tiff, .tif, .bmp, and .pdf.

choices.C: When using the automation framework to consume predictions from a stream.
choices.A: When comments are uploaded or updated on the platform.
choices.D: When pinning a new model version.

questions.question_text: When does UiPath Communications Mining charge AI units?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
should be A

questions.question_text: Which of these statements is true about precision and recall statistics for specific labels in UiPath Communications Mining precision?

choices.B: The label precision and recall statistics are determined by the confidence threshold.
choices.A: The label precision and recall statistics are determined by the model's rating.
choices.D: The label precision and recall statistics are determined by the model's coverage.
choices.C: The label precision and recall statistics are determined by the mean average precision (MAP).

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Precision versus recall

We also need to understand the trade-off between precision and recall within a particular model version.

The precision and recall statistics for each label in a particular model version are determined by a confidence threshold (i.e. how confident is the model that this label applies?).


https://docs.uipath.com/communications-mining/automation-cloud/latest/user-guide/precision-and-recall

questions.question_text: When processing a document type that comes in a high variety of layouts, what is the recommended data extraction methodology?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
It should be model based as rule based is used for structured formats. Any layout change in the format will require reconfiguration so rule based doesn't fir here.

Selected Answer: B
At first, I thought it was A, but I put the question on ChatGPT and it gave me a detailed explanation of why it is B.

I think it is A, one document types varies greatly. Here is the uipath definition. The ML approach is strongly recommended for structured or semi-structured documents in which layouts of different document providers vary greatly

Selected Answer: B
A hybrid approach would be more approriate since the layouts can have a high number of varieties. 

https://www.uipath.com/blog/ai/improved-document-processing
